divs: sighting detailsi went out on my balcony to check out the skies because i've been seeing some flickering lights in the sky lately. i noticed some very bright white flickering lights in the northeastern sky, very low above the horizon. after about a minute or so, i started to see what looked like a more constant small white light within the flickering lights. this light seemed to flicker on and off much more slowly than the ones surrounding it. this went on for about 20 seconds or so before all of the lights suddenly went out. i continued to watch the skies for a few minutes more when i noticed a small white star\orb-like light approaching from the north. at first i just assumed it was a plane coming from miami international airport which is directly north of me at least 10 miles away. as it got closer i began to realize it couldn't be a plane because it made absolutely no sound, had no other lights on it, blinking,strobing or otherwise and i could not make out it's shape. with a plane you can easily make out it's frame,tail,etc. but i could only see a white orb-like light. i also noticed that as it got closer, the color started to change and darken to a dark yellow. unfortunately it didn't fly directly over me, but just to the side of my building instead so i ran out of my apartment to the landing in the rear of my building to see it come out on the other side. it was still moving south at the same speed and appeared to look even darker in color, almost like it's light was fading. i watched it as long as i could until it disappeared into the rest of the city lights. i suspect this light\object either came from the flickering lights i'd seen earlier, or it was the exact same object. it was very similar to something i'd seen about a month ago around 5am as i was walking my dog. i just looked directly up and saw a white star-like light moving very fast in a perfectly straight line and heading east. it flew right over me and again i didn't hear a sound or make out it's frame.
trends: There have been 97 other sightings in Miami
There were no other sightings in Miami on or around August 6th 2009
